Using text 2022/03/10 By default, Pupate uses a monospaced font. That makes it easy to do things like... - make - bulleted - lists or |-------------| | put | | some words | | in a | | box | |-------------| or ____________________ < include ASCII art! > -------------------- \ ^__^ \ (o-)\_______ /\ (__)\ )/ ||----w | || || Pupate won't break your leading or trailing spaces, and won't mess with your newlines. Everything as you type it.
